summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the movement of securities between financial accounts. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, communicates with colleagues about missing items related to Southern Financial and Southern Trust accounts. The email highlights the coordination required for financial transactions and the roles of various individuals involved.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is included in the email chain and is involved in the instructions regarding the securities movement.

persons.name: Janet
persons.context: Janet is copied on the email to Harry, indicating her involvement in the securities movement discussion.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is also included in the email chain, suggesting her role in the securities transaction process.
